name: Bus Metro Coach: Driver Pro
description:
Bus Metro Coach: Driver Pro is the first coach driving game that will teach you to drive a real coach across different scenarios! Take people from a city to another, show them amazing places and landscapes. Open world map, incredible vehicles, wonderful interiors will make you feel a realistic coach bus driving experience! It's time to get on board and drive through Europe
Features:
- Cool jumbo 3 different metro buses
- Multiple missions and level
- Realistic metro bus control and physics
- Beautiful 3d city environment
- Animated loading and offloading passengers
- Super bus driving experience
- Different camera views including cockpit driving
